import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Scanner;

/**
 *
 * @author DELL
 */
 class lukas
{
    public static void main(String[] args)
    {
        int n,k;
        Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
        n=sc.nextInt();
        int arr[]=new int[n]; 
        k=sc.nextInt();
        for(int i=0;i<=n-1;i++)
        {
           arr[i]=sc.nextInt();
        }
       Arrays.sort(arr);
        System.out.println(arr[k-1]);
         
       
    }
        
}
